title: Method of travel to work
publisher: International trade in services by subnational areas of the UK: 2018
description: Modified version of the CT1108 - Workplace table: Method of travel to work (2001 specification) by industry (2 digits). The data has been updated for the latest local authority structural changes and simplified industry breakdown as used in associated article. Forms part of the datasets that comprise the ONS article publication "Coronavirus and travel to work [month/year]", along with "Distance travelled to work".
datasetNotes: On landing page scroll down to latest dataset under heading "Your download option".
sizingNotes: Simple table structure, one tab of data already in tidy data like format.
